t: Can you sell generic items on Amazon? - Riverbend Consulting
s: December 18, 2024 - Generic items on Amazon are unbranded items with no recognizable name or logo. Think of them as the “no-name” goods on store shelves—functional but lacking that extra appeal from a trusted brand. Generic items typically come from manufacturers who mass-produce items and sell them in bulk ...

s: November 8, 2024 - A generic brand on Amazon refers to products sold without a specific brand name or trademark. t: How to Check Amazon Products for Generic brand? | Help Center | Seller Assistant
s: You would see a "GB" icon next to "like" and "dislike" icons. If you hover over it you will see crucial data why this listing could cause problems with Amazon. Moreover you are able to see if the product belong to "Generic" or "Unknown" brand in our Quick View feature.
